name: TENANT
description:
If you can't beat them, turn into them.

Humanity is in danger and you are our last hope. Use your special ability to invade the enemy ships and use their weapons to your advantage. Each spaceship has an unique ability that can be useful in different combat situations. 

Features:
  • Invasion mechanic where the player can shift to enemy ships.
  • Fast-paced, hardcore, arcade shmup gameplay.
  • 4 spaceship classes with different abilities each.
  • Dynamic soundtrack that evolves through game stages.
  • Unique and challenging Boss fight.
  • Original visual style, a mixture of 3D and pixel-art.
New extra level:

Subscribe to our newsletter and get access to an exclusive extra level: "Ruins of Renas".

Controls:

Turbo: RT/R2/Z
Attack: X/⧠/X
Invasion ability: LT/L2/CTRL + Attack (when charged)
